mapper.select: select id, brand_id, product_category_id, product_attribute_category_id, name, imageUrl, delete_status, publish_status, recommand_status, sort, sale, price, promotion_price, gift_point, sub_title, stock, low_stock, service_ids, album_pics, detail_mobile_html, promotion_start_time, promotion_end_time, promotion_per_limit, promotion_type, brand_name, product_category_name from pusiqibao.sp_product where id = #{id}

select id, brand_id, product_category_id, product_attribute_category_id, name, imageUrl, delete_status, publish_status, recommand_status, sort, sale, price, promotion_price, gift_point, sub_title, stock, low_stock, service_ids, album_pics, detail_mobile_html, promotion_start_time, promotion_end_time, promotion_per_limit, promotion_type, brand_name, product_category_name from pusiqibao.sp_product limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into pusiqibao.sp_product(brand_id, product_category_id, product_attribute_category_id, name, imageUrl, delete_status, publish_status, recommand_status, sort, sale, price, promotion_price, gift_point, sub_title, stock, low_stock, service_ids, album_pics, detail_mobile_html, promotion_start_time, promotion_end_time, promotion_per_limit, promotion_type, brand_name, product_category_name) values (#{brandId}, #{productCategoryId}, #{productAttributeCategoryId}, #{name}, #{imageurl}, #{deleteStatus}, #{publishStatus}, #{recommandStatus}, #{sort}, #{sale}, #{price}, #{promotionPrice}, #{giftPoint}, #{subTitle}, #{stock}, #{lowStock}, #{serviceIds}, #{albumPics}, #{detailMobileHtml}, #{promotionStartTime}, #{promotionEndTime}, #{promotionPerLimit}, #{promotionType}, #{brandName}, #{productCategoryName})

insert into pusiqibao.sp_product(brand_id, product_category_id, product_attribute_category_id, name, imageUrl, delete_status, publish_status, recommand_status, sort, sale, price, promotion_price, gift_point, sub_title, stock, low_stock, service_ids, album_pics, detail_mobile_html, promotion_start_time, promotion_end_time, promotion_per_limit, promotion_type, brand_name, product_category_name) values
(#{entity.brandId}, #{entity.productCategoryId}, #{entity.productAttributeCategoryId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.imageurl}, #{entity.deleteStatus}, #{entity.publishStatus}, #{entity.recommandStatus}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.sale}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.promotionPrice}, #{entity.giftPoint}, #{entity.subTitle}, #{entity.stock}, #{entity.lowStock}, #{entity.serviceIds}, #{entity.albumPics}, #{entity.detailMobileHtml}, #{entity.promotionStartTime}, #{entity.promotionEndTime}, #{entity.promotionPerLimit}, #{entity.promotionType}, #{entity.brandName}, #{entity.productCategoryName})

insert into pusiqibao.sp_product(brand_id, product_category_id, product_attribute_category_id, name, imageUrl, delete_status, publish_status, recommand_status, sort, sale, price, promotion_price, gift_point, sub_title, stock, low_stock, service_ids, album_pics, detail_mobile_html, promotion_start_time, promotion_end_time, promotion_per_limit, promotion_type, brand_name, product_category_name) values
(#{entity.brandId}, #{entity.productCategoryId}, #{entity.productAttributeCategoryId}, #{entity.name}, #{entity.imageurl}, #{entity.deleteStatus}, #{entity.publishStatus}, #{entity.recommandStatus}, #{entity.sort}, #{entity.sale}, #{entity.price}, #{entity.promotionPrice}, #{entity.giftPoint}, #{entity.subTitle}, #{entity.stock}, #{entity.lowStock}, #{entity.serviceIds}, #{entity.albumPics}, #{entity.detailMobileHtml}, #{entity.promotionStartTime}, #{entity.promotionEndTime}, #{entity.promotionPerLimit}, #{entity.promotionType}, #{entity.brandName}, #{entity.productCategoryName})
on duplicate key update brand_id = values(brand_id) , product_category_id = values(product_category_id) , product_attribute_category_id = values(product_attribute_category_id) , name = values(name) , imageUrl = values(imageUrl) , delete_status = values(delete_status) , publish_status = values(publish_status) , recommand_status = values(recommand_status) , sort = values(sort) , sale = values(sale) , price = values(price) , promotion_price = values(promotion_price) , gift_point = values(gift_point) , sub_title = values(sub_title) , stock = values(stock) , low_stock = values(low_stock) , service_ids = values(service_ids) , album_pics = values(album_pics) , detail_mobile_html = values(detail_mobile_html) , promotion_start_time = values(promotion_start_time) , promotion_end_time = values(promotion_end_time) , promotion_per_limit = values(promotion_per_limit) , promotion_type = values(promotion_type) , brand_name = values(brand_name) , product_category_name = values(product_category_name)
mapper.update:
update pusiqibao.sp_product
brand_id = #{brandId},
product_category_id = #{productCategoryId},
product_attribute_category_id = #{productAttributeCategoryId},
name = #{name},
imageUrl = #{imageurl},
delete_status = #{deleteStatus},
publish_status = #{publishStatus},
recommand_status = #{recommandStatus},
sort = #{sort},
sale = #{sale},
price = #{price},
promotion_price = #{promotionPrice},
gift_point = #{giftPoint},
sub_title = #{subTitle},
stock = #{stock},
low_stock = #{lowStock},
service_ids = #{serviceIds},
album_pics = #{albumPics},
detail_mobile_html = #{detailMobileHtml},
promotion_start_time = #{promotionStartTime},
promotion_end_time = #{promotionEndTime},
promotion_per_limit = #{promotionPerLimit},
promotion_type = #{promotionType},
brand_name = #{brandName},
product_category_name = #{productCategoryName},
where id = #{id}
